events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application was successfully categorized under the software engineering cluster based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will assist you throughout the hiring process for the engineer role.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully to assess your software development knowledge and compatibility.
Thank you for the prompt reply confirming your availability for the next steps in the technical interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior developers to evaluate your coding skills and problem-solving ability.
